mapper.select:
select
from ecommerce_product_store
and product_name like concat('%', #{productName}, '%')
and category like concat('%', #{category}, '%')
and price between #{minPrice} and #{maxPrice}
and (upload_opencart = false or upload_shopify = false)
order by data_added
desc
, price
desc
